Trial of Tyrion Lannister026613rgsectgjfos3dhdf87v2shv657vv1pr1634082014-10-31T15:40:22ZSer Hasty25541548Fixed link{{disambig|Trial of Tyrion Lannister}}

The '''trial of [[Tyrion Lannister]]''' may refer to:

*[[First Trial of Tyrion Lannister|First Trial of Tyrion Lannister: ]]Tyrion stands trial at the Eyrie for the attempted murder of [[Bran Stark]].
*[[Court trial of Tyrion Lannister]]: Tyrion stands trial for the murder of King [[Joffrey Baratheon|Joffrey]]
*[[Second Trial by combat of Tyrion Lannister]]: Tyrion's trial by combat for the murder of Joffrey.
[[Category:Disambiguations]]
